title: [K-12] Gamification-based Course to Strengthen Mathematical Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Real-time interaction using smartphone-based game elements, combined with offline workshops

learning_goals: Learners can develop at least three gamified problem-solving scenarios for mathematics using the gamification design framework (goal-challenge-reward).
Learners can design a mobile-optimized quiz-based learning module to achieve over 90% participation rates.
Learners can analyze the educational effectiveness of gamification activities through peer assessment using a four-level rubric.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
